question:
Which of the following is true about Global Tiger Forum?
  1. Its secretariat is in New Delhi
  2. It meets once in 3 years
Select the correct answer from the codes given below-
explanation: Global Tiger Forum is an inter- governmental body with its Secretariat in New Delhi. It was established in 1994 with the aims to conserve tiger population across the 13 tiger range countries. It meets once in 3 years.
